price: Àti pé dájúdájú òǹgbẹ kò níí gbẹ ọ́ nínú rẹ̀, òòrùn kò sì níí pa ọ́.”
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
